name: twitch-alarm
title: Twitch Alarm
description: An alarm that plays a sound notification when specified Twitch streamers go live.
author: hunter

preferences.name: streamer_list
preferences.title: Streamers to receive alerts from
preferences.description: List each streamer's channel name, with a comma separating each individual channel

preferences.name: import_user
preferences.title: User to import followed streams from
preferences.description: Type in the Twitch username of the user you wish to import followed streams from, then click the import button below

preferences.label: Import followed streams
preferences.name: importClick
preferences.title: Click to import followed streams from the user specified above

preferences.name: update_interval
preferences.title: Seconds to wait between updates
preferences.description: Number of seconds waited between checking for online streams

preferences.name: sortingMethod
preferences.title: Sorting method for online streamers
preferences.description: 'Most recent' sorts streams from most recent to oldest. 'Most viewers' sorts streams from ones with the most viewers to ones with the least

preferences.name: defaultHide2
preferences.title: Hide offline streamers
preferences.description: If enabled, offline streamers will not be listed in the interface

preferences.name: defaultHide
preferences.title: Hide online streamer information by default
preferences.description: If enabled, the name of online streamers will only be shown unless you manually unhide their information in the menu

preferences.name: soundAlarmOff
preferences.title: Disable sound alarm
preferences.description: When this option is checked, the only alert will be the flashing badge on the add-on icon

preferences.name: alarm_length
preferences.title: Length of alarm: indefinite if 0
preferences.description: The length of the alarm can be limited to a specified number of seconds; when set to 0, it goes off until the user responds to it

preferences.name: debounce_interval
preferences.title: Seconds it takes for a streamer who went offline to be registered as offline
preferences.description: Low values may result in multiple alarms going off when a stream begins and ends due to Twitch API issues

preferences.name: uniqueIds
preferences.title: Do not play alarm on browser startup if you've already received an alarm for that particular stream
preferences.description: This only applies to individual streams. If the streamer quits streaming and starts again later, you will receive an alarm for that
